front.title: DHCP Option for Configuring IPv6-over-IPv4 Tunnels

abstract.t: This document provides a mechanism by which the DHCPv4 servers can provide information about the IPv6-over-IPv4 tunnel endpoint. The IPv4/IPv6 dual stack nodes can use this information to set up a tunnel to the tunnel endpoint to obtain IPv6 connectivity without requiring manual intervention at any of the tunnel endpoints at tunnel establishment time.
